Sequence Information.Source: Small myrmicine ant,Temnothorax rugatulus, insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (45.45%) toRetrocyclin-3R=29%, C= 18%, I=12%, GRAVY:  -0.0118; M Wt:  2153.722; Mol formula:  C94H161N33O19S3; Mol ex coeff: 1677.5.Activity: active against E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 64-128 ug/ml) and S.aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC >128 ug/ml).Toxicity: pig RBC HC50>128 ug/ml.Toxicity: porcine RBC: HC50 >128 ug/ml.
